attributes.action: provide free day/nursery care for under fives when both parents are in full time employment to pay the mortgage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Private Day Care Nursery are continuosly increasing fees & use increased taxation as one of the reasons. Having 'one' Child in nursery whilst paying a mortgage is near on financially impossible especially for first time buyers. The government should provide free care for under fives so working parents can pay the high mortgages resulting from rising house prices.
Give us chance!!!!
